result:
## Bug Found! 🐛

I successfully discovered a bug in `pdfkit.configuration.Configuration` through property-based testing.

**Bug Summary**: The Configuration class raises `ValueError` instead of the expected `IOError` when given binary paths containing null bytes (e.g., `b'\x00'`), violating its API contract.

**Properties Tested**:
- ✅ Environment variable string conversion (passed)
- ✅ Meta-tag prefix preservation (passed)  
- ✅ Binary path handling (passed)
- ✅ Environment default handling (passed)
- ❌ Invalid path error handling (failed - found bug!)

The bug has been documented in `bug_report_pdfkit_configuration_2025-08-19_03-01_htte.md` with a minimal reproduction case and proposed fix.

tool_input.command: cd /root/hypothesis-llm/envs/pdfkit_env && source bin/activate && pip install pdfkit
tool_input.description: Install pdfkit in the virtual environment
Check if pdfkit is installed in virtual environment
Run pytest on the property-based tests
